articles.title: Congress wants only one India, unlike BJP, says Rahul Gandhi

articles.title: Thane: Police arrest man for 'raping', blackmailing friend
articles.description: A 33-year-old man was arrested by the Kalwa police for allegedly raping his friend by spiking her drink and later threatening to upload her pictures in compromising positions on the internet after she refused his marriage proposal.
